name: Barton Thorn

topics.response_text: My girl is trapped by geckos on the ridge and I can't get to her. Please, she's going to die!
Fine, just leave me to my misery then.
I'll give you whatever you want, just hurry!
Go up the path past the broken radio tower and go to the right... they're at the top of the trail.

topics.topic_text: I'll see what I can do.
topics.response_text: You will? Thank you for helping me. Please hurry.
But she'll die if you don't help!
You just gotta help her, man.

description:
Barton Thorn is a 48 year-old Caucasian Male.

A prospector living near Goodsprings, known for his deceptive nature and treasure-seeking ambitions. He has a reputation for being untrustworthy among locals.

Barton Thorn's Personality: Deceptive, opportunistic, and self-serving. Barton puts his own interests above others and is willing to manipulate and kill to get what he wants.

Barton Thorn's Backstory: Born and raised in the Mojave Wasteland, Barton Thorn has spent most of his life as a prospector, searching for valuable resources and treasure. He has a history of deception and betrayal, often abandoning partners or killing them when they discover his true intentions. His reputation has made him a pariah among other prospectors and locals, forcing him to live on the outskirts of settlements like Goodsprings.
